Title.text: Dream Machine

Description.text: The Dream Machine, a device designed by Burroughs and Brion Gysin and constructed by Ian Sommerville, was designed to help stimulate brain activity and bring about a hallucinatory state.

RepositoryName.text: Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Columbia University

Notes.text: Date based on the earliest and latest dates of the William Seward Burroughs Papers collection.

Title.text: Dream Machine. Video

Description.text:
The Dream Machine, a device designed by Burroughs and Brion Gysin and constructed by Ian Sommerville, was designed to help stimulate brain activity and bring about a hallucinatory state.
Alan Govenar directed this short video showing the Dream Machine in operation.
